extendedInfo.description: LIVESCORE Live scores directly from the source, the 1st live score service on the Internet, powered by LiveScore.com since 1998. This application comes directly from LiveScore Ltd., the leaders and inventors of real-time delivery of live sport data and owners of the no.1 ranked football / soccer web site globally.FEATURES - Live football / soccer scores from leagues, cup competitions and championships worldwide - More than 1000 live football / soccer games followed live every week during the season - Detailed match information - Live tennis, basketball, ice hockey & cricket scores- Live league tables for football, hockey and basketball- Select your own refresh period - User friendly - Time & Date localized - Very fast and responsive even on slow connection - Minimal data transfers - Bandwidth friendly with our data compression - Lightweight- FreeREQUIREMENTS Android OS 2.0.1 (or higher) required.

reviews.title: Simple and easy to use
reviews.comment: Great app overall - nice and straightforward.   However, it\'d be nice if you could \'follow\' a game and then get notifications of events in that game, outside the app.
reviews.author: Niall Dillane

reviews.title: (N)
reviews.comment: It\'s a great and useful application... I would like to get notifications about matchs i select so i dont have to open the app every couple mins ..please add that if possible thqu
reviews.author: Dany Nouhra

reviews.title: Not shows cards (yellow, red )
reviews.comment: It\'s a very good application i like it very much but after an update it stop showing cards it only shows goals and sometimes it even don\'t shows who scored the goal
reviews.author: Mehul Karamchandani

reviews.comment: I like the timely update and its global coverage. However its should cover a little more of African CAF, CECAFA CHAN etc
reviews.author: Gumaoshabe Apollo

reviews.title: Ideal for real time score updates
reviews.comment: Excellent score update app and the new update which has made the football league tables available has added more gloss to it.
reviews.author: Souvik Banerjee

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.comment: I think this the only application that I rate with 5 stars, there is still room for improvement but all in all briliant app.
reviews.author: Rara S.

reviews.title: Where is field hockey?
reviews.comment: Great app, but plz include Field hockey scores also as it is a popular sport. Plz plz i will be very thankfull 2 uu
reviews.author: Muhammad Jawad

reviews.title: Pretty cool, needs goal notifications
reviews.comment: Its excellent but if u could either choose ur fav team or leagues n get vibration updates it would be a epic 5 starzz, still i like it .. ;)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Good working on network connection but funny that Nepal isn\'t included. All ongoing events of every corner of our globe must be included. I\'ll give you 5 on 5 when all countries are included. Though i must give credit for your work.
reviews.author: rafeeq vp

reviews.title: Best
reviews.comment: Works great, would b a five star if it had  boxing results an information.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: Good app. But missing option to add favourite team
reviews.author: Nitin Goenka

reviews.title: Kbbadmus
reviews.comment: Dis app is soo sooo cool and its newsest update wit league table is amazingly gud... I love it
reviews.author: Badmus Kolade

reviews.title: Fast soccer score
reviews.comment: Using this app, make a whole lot easier to get soccer score update.
reviews.author: Simin Leeandro

reviews.title: Simply the best
reviews.comment: Much better since the update, ignore the negative reviews, this app is THE best and much much quicker than sky sports score centre
reviews.author: Mark Waters

reviews.title: S3 Mini
reviews.comment: Great apps for live score..keep up the good work.
reviews.author: Fadjmeer Daud

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: No single problem! Cheers up
reviews.author: Muthana Samir

reviews.title: App set clock
reviews.comment: It\'s good, my only problem is that the app clock is adding 1 hr. To the actual time .. so please can you adjust it so that i can set my own app  clock accordingly ?
reviews.author: Marwan Khatab

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: If You could Add The Subs . It would be 5 stars
reviews.author: Kra Mra

reviews.title: I love it
reviews.comment: It just makes everything simple
reviews.author: Ameyaw Philip

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Awesome and easy to navigate app. Only thing that would make this perfect 5/5 Would be a favourites bar to stop having to scroll to check the wanted scores.
